name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Boil the spaghetti.
Cook the pancetta until crispy.
Mix eggs and parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

name: Chicken Curry
steps: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
Add spices and cook for a minute.
Add chicken and brown it.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer until chicken is cooked through.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Heat sesame oil in a pan.
Add garlic and ginger and sauté.
Add mixed vegetables and stir fry until tender.
Pour in soy sauce and cook for another minute.
Serve hot.

name: Beef Tacos
steps: Cook ground beef in a pan.
Add taco seasoning and mix well.
Warm taco shells in the oven.
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.
Serve immediately.

name: Pancakes
steps: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl.
Whisk in milk and eggs until smooth.
Heat a pan and melt butter.
Pour batter into the pan and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown.

name: Caesar Salad
steps: Chop romaine lettuce.
Add croutons and parmesan cheese.
Toss with Caesar dressing.
Serve immediately.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Butter the bread slices.
Place cheese between two slices of bread.
Grill in a pan until golden brown and cheese is melted.
Serve hot.

name: Tomato Soup
steps: Sauté onion and garlic.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Blend the mixture until smooth.
Add vegetable broth and simmer.
Stir in cream and serve.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Cream butter and sugar.
Add eggs and mix well.
Stir in flour and baking soda.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.

name: Lasagna
steps: Cook lasagna noodles.
Brown ground beef and add tomato sauce.
Layer noodles, meat sauce, and cheeses in a baking dish.
Bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.
Let cool before serving.

name: French Toast
steps: Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and sugar.
Dip bread slices in the mixture.
Cook in a buttered pan until golden brown.
Serve with syrup.

name: Guacamole
steps: Mash avocados.
Mix in chopped onion, tomatoes, and cilantro.
Add lime juice and salt to taste.
Serve with tortilla chips.

name: BBQ Chicken Wings
steps: Season chicken wings with salt and pepper.
Bake at 400°F for 45 minutes.
Toss with BBQ sauce.
Serve hot.

name: Margarita Pizza
steps: Roll out pizza dough.
Spread tomato sauce on the dough.
Top with mozzarella cheese and basil.
Bake at 475°F for 10-12 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Beef Stew
steps: Brown beef in a pot.
Add onions and cook until soft.
Add potatoes, carrots, beef broth, and tomato paste.
Simmer for 1.5 hours.
Serve hot.

name: Shrimp Scampi
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic in butter.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Stir in lemon juice and parsley.
Toss with pasta and serve.

name: Egg Fried Rice
steps: Cook rice and set aside.
Scramble eggs in a pan.
Add peas and carrots and cook until tender.
Stir in rice and soy sauce.
Garnish with green onions and serve.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps: Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds.
Brown ground beef and mix with cooked rice and tomato sauce.
Stuff peppers with the mixture.
Top with cheese and bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Chicken Alfredo
steps: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic in butter.
Add chicken and cook until done.
Stir in heavy cream and parmesan cheese.
Toss with fettuccine and serve.

name: Greek Salad
steps: Chop cucumber, tomatoes, and red onion.
Mix with feta cheese and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with oregano.
Serve immediately.

name: Banana Bread
steps: Mash bananas in a bowl.
Mix in sugar, butter, and eggs.
Stir in flour and baking soda.
Pour into a loaf pan and bake at 350°F for 50-60 minutes.
Let cool before serving.

name: Fish Tacos
steps: Season fish with taco seasoning.
Cook fish in a pan until done.
Warm taco shells in the oven.
Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, lime, and cilantro.
Serve immediately.

name: Minestrone Soup
steps: Sauté onion, carrots, and celery.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Stir in beans, pasta, and vegetable broth.
Simmer until pasta is cooked.
Serve hot.

name: Apple Pie
steps: Peel and slice apples.
Mix apples with sugar and cinnamon.
Place in pie crust and dot with butter.
Cover with top crust and bake at 375°F for 50-60 minutes.
Let cool before serving.

name: Quiche Lorraine
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Cook bacon until crispy and chop.
Whisk eggs, heavy cream, and nutmeg.
Spread bacon and cheese in pie crust.
Pour egg mixture over bacon and cheese.
Bake for 35-40 minutes.

name: Pad Thai
steps: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
Sauté shrimp until pink.
Scramble eggs in the pan.
Add noodles, bean sprouts, and pad thai sauce.
Toss everything together and serve with peanuts and lime.

name: Clam Chowder
steps: Cook bacon until crispy and set aside.
Sauté onion and celery in butter.
Add potatoes and cook until tender.
Stir in clams and cream.
Simmer until thickened.
Top with bacon and serve.

name: Falafel
steps: Blend chickpeas, onion, garlic, parsley, cumin, and coriander.
Form mixture into balls and coat with flour.
Fry until golden brown.
Serve with pita and tahini sauce.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
steps: Slice and salt eggplant to remove bitterness.
Dip eggplant slices in beaten eggs and coat with breadcrumbs.
Fry eggplant until golden brown.
Layer eggplant, tomato sauce, and cheeses in a baking dish.
Bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.

name: Gazpacho
steps: Blend tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, onion, and garlic.
Add olive oil and vinegar.
Chill in the refrigerator before serving.

name: Ratatouille
steps: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil.
Add chopped eggplant, zucchini, and bell peppers.
Cook until vegetables are tender.
Stir in tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Chicken Parmesan
steps: Dip chicken breasts in beaten eggs and coat with breadcrumbs.
Fry chicken until golden brown.
Place chicken in a baking dish and top with tomato sauce and cheeses.
Bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.

name: Beef Stroganoff
steps: Sauté onion and mushrooms in butter.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Stir in flour and beef broth.
Simmer until thickened.
Stir in sour cream and serve over noodles.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
steps: Cook chicken and shred.
Sauté onion, carrots, and celery.
Add chicken broth and bring to a boil.
Add noodles and cook until tender.
Stir in shredded chicken and serve.

name: Tiramisu
steps: Whisk egg yolks and sugar until thick.
Fold in mascarpone cheese.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer in a dish.
Spread mascarpone mixture over ladyfingers.
Repeat layers and dust with cocoa powder.
Chill for at least 3 hours before serving.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
steps: Cook and slice chicken breast.
Toss romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Place chicken and lettuce mixture on a tortilla.
Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and wrap.

name: Stuffed Mushrooms
steps: Remove stems from mushrooms.
Mix cream cheese, garlic, and parmesan cheese.
Stuff mushrooms with the mixture.
Sprinkle with breadcrumbs and bake at 375°F for 20 minutes.

name: Chicken Quesadilla
steps: Cook and slice chicken breast.
Sauté bell peppers and onion.
Place chicken, peppers, onion, and cheese on a tortilla.
Top with another tortilla and cook in a pan until cheese is melted.
Cut into wedges and serve.

name: Pumpkin Pie
steps: Preheat oven to 425°F.
Mix pumpkin puree, eggs, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and evaporated milk.
Pour mixture into pie crust.
Bake for 15 minutes, then reduce temperature to 350°F and bake for 45 minutes.
Let cool before serving.

name: Chicken Pot Pie
steps: Cook and shred chicken.
Sauté onion, carrots, and peas in butter.
Stir in flour and chicken broth to make a sauce.
Add chicken to the sauce.
Pour mixture into a pie crust and cover with another crust.
Bake at 375°F for 30 minutes.

name: Shrimp Tacos
steps: Season shrimp with taco seasoning.
Cook shrimp in a pan until done.
Warm taco shells in the oven.
Assemble tacos with shrimp, cabbage, lime, and cilantro.
Serve immediately.

name: French Onion Soup
steps: Sauté onions in butter until caramelized.
Stir in flour and beef broth.
Simmer for 30 minutes.
Pour soup into bowls and top with bread and cheese.
Broil until cheese is melted and bubbly.

name: Chicken Fajitas
steps: Slice chicken, bell peppers, and onion.
Cook chicken in a pan with fajita seasoning.
Add bell peppers and onion and cook until tender.
Serve with tortillas.

name: Chocolate Mousse
steps: Melt chocolate and let cool.
Whisk egg yolks and sugar until thick.
Fold in melted chocolate.
Whip heavy cream and fold into chocolate mixture.
Chill for at least 2 hours before serving.

name: Vegetable Curry
steps: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger.
Add curry powder and cook for a minute.
Add mixed vegetables and cook until tender.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Lemon Bars
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F.
Mix flour, butter, and sugar to make a crust.
Press crust into a baking dish and bake for 20 minutes.
Whisk eggs, sugar, lemon juice, and lemon zest.
Pour mixture over crust and bake for another 20 minutes.
Let cool before serving.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices.
Cook chicken in a pan until done.
Add tomato sauce and simmer.
Stir in cream and cook for another 10 minutes.
Serve with rice.

name: Blueberry Muffins
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Whisk in eggs, milk, and melted butter.
Fold in blueberries.
Pour batter into muffin tins and bake for 20 minutes.

name: Beef Wellington
steps: Sear beef tenderloin and let cool.
Chop and sauté mushrooms.
Spread mustard on beef and wrap with prosciutto and mushrooms.
Wrap beef in puff pastry and brush with egg wash.
Bake at 400°F for 30-40 minutes.

name: Pasta Primavera
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic in olive oil.
Add mixed vegetables and cook until tender.
Toss pasta with vegetables and parmesan cheese.
Serve hot.
